qa_pairs.reasoning_text:
<1> A Heineken 5L draught keg stands beside a bottle of Sriracha hot sauce inside an empty refrigerator, both chilled and ready for use.  
<2> The keg’s green lid and silver body contrast with the red sauce bottle, which has a green cap and visible Asian characters.  
<3> The Heineken label clearly shows “CERVEZA DE BARRIL” and a red star, indicating its brand and origin as a draft beer.  
<4> The Sriracha bottle’s label reads “HOT CHILI SAUCE” and includes a rooster graphic, suggesting its spicy flavor profile.  
<5> Both items are placed on the refrigerator’s white shelf, with the keg’s condensation hinting at its cool temperature.  
<final> A chilled Heineken draught keg and Sriracha hot sauce bottle sit side by side on a refrigerator shelf, ready for a flavorful pairing.

1. A Heineken 5-liter draught keg sits beside a bottle of Sriracha hot sauce inside an empty refrigerator.  
2. The keg features a green and silver label with the brand's iconic red star and "CERVEZA DE BARRIL" text.  
3. The Sriracha bottle, with its green cap and red sauce, shows visible condensation from refrigeration.  
4. The refrigerator’s white interior includes wire shelves and molded plastic handles for storage.  
5. Both items are positioned on the bottom shelf, suggesting preparation for a chilled beverage or meal.  

<final>A Heineken draught keg and a bottle of Sriracha hot sauce rest side by side on a refrigerator shelf, ready for a refreshing drink or spicy meal.</final>
